II. Purpose of Addendum
The agency is no longer leasing office space. The Chief Administrator purchased a
new building and moved the program to the new address on 4/29/22.
III. Methodology
4/04/2022 The agency notified DCWL of the upcoming change of location.
4/05/2022 An application was provided to the Chief Administrator.
4/06/2022 The agency submitted an application reflecting the new address.
4/28/2022 A site visit occurred at the new location: 1401 W. Michigan Ave. Jackson,
MI 49202.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
On 4/28/2022 a site visit occurred. The office was viewed and found to meet
licensing requirements. The building is a structure that was formerly a house, now
zoned for commercial. The two-story building has ample space for staff offices,
visitation for families, and storage of files. The agency will continue using their
locking file cabinets for all documentation.
V. Recommendation
The recommendation is to continue the current license, with the updated address
as reflected on the 4/6/2022 application.
